hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '(auth|payment|security|\.env|credentials)'; then echo '[WARN] Modifying critical system file. Ensure user approval per CLAUDE.md Tier 1 rules.' && exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '(rm -rf|git push --force|DROP TABLE|DELETE FROM)'; then echo '[BLOCKED] Dangerous command detected' && exit 2; fi
echo '[CLAUDE] Before planning: Read CLAUDE.md → PROJECT.md → docs/README.md → docs/TODO.md. See CLAUDE.md#knowledge-sources for full protocol.'
if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'docs/'; then echo '[CLAUDE] Documentation modified. Remember: update Last Updated date, index new docs in docs/README.md.'; fi
echo '[CLAUDE] Session started. Core docs: CLAUDE.md | PROJECT.md | docs/README.md | docs/TODO.md'
echo '[CLAUDE] Task complete. Remember: Log results in plan file, document improvements, update TODO.md if needed.'
echo '[CLAUDE] Context compacting. Key context: Current plan file, TODO.md state, recent decisions.'
echo '[CLAUDE] Session ending. Ensure: plan files updated, TODO.md current, no uncommitted critical changes.'
